entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm except 15 cm over northern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
